p:
Our analysis showed that dengue epidemics at a cyclic frequency of 3–4 years were characteristic of the dynamic of the disease besides its expected 1-year seasonal cycle. Previous studies have documented the occurrence of inter-annual fluctuations in dengue incidence. However, the periodicities reported were different, ranging from 2–3 years
8, 15, 31, 32 to 2–5 years
9 .
